howItWorks.heading: How It Works
howItWorks.description: Turn photos into captivating animations in three simple steps

items.title: Upload Your Photo
items.description: Drag and drop or browse your files to select an image. Formats supported include JPG, PNG, and WebP.

items.title: Apply the Effect
items.description: Watch as our AI intelligently applies the Ken Burns effect, adding pan and zoom dynamics to your image.

items.title: Download Your Animation
items.description: Preview your animated photo and download it in high quality, ready to share or present.

faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Get answers to your questions about the AI Ken Burns Effect

items.title: What is the Ken Burns effect?
items.description: The Ken Burns effect is a popular technique used to animate still images by panning and zooming in the frame, creating engaging video presentations.

items.title: Is there a limit on the number of photos I can animate?
items.description: No! You can create as many animations as you'd like. Each user receives 30 free credits daily.

items.title: Can I use my animated content commercially?
items.description: Yes! Users with a subscription can utilize generated animations for commercial purposes.

items.title: How secure is my image processing?
items.description: All animations are created securely on your device, ensuring your photos are never uploaded or stored on external servers.

footer.heading: Ready to Animate Your Photos?
footer.description: Try the AI Ken Burns Effect now and see your images come alive. No sign-up needed.
